description: ViewSonic VA2702w is a 27" big screen LCD display with Full HD 1080p resolution. With wide viewing angles, 60,000:1 Dynamic Contrast Ratio, DVI / VGA dual inputs, and VESA mount option, VA2702wm offers crystal crisp images and flexible set up. The display's large viewing area greatly enhances productivity when a user works on large spreadsheets or uses multiple applications. 3 year warranty, industry's best pixel performance policy, and energy saving Eco mode make VA2702w the best value for corporations, home and education.
title: ViewSonic VA2702W 27-Inch Full HD 1080p Widescreen LCD Monitor with DVI and VGA Inputs - Black
